评论详情: I got this for pajama set to wear after I give birth, and they are very cozy and soft. They did come with a strong smell, so I needed to wash them before I handle the smell. Also, I didn’t like the drawstring that came with the shorts, so I removed the string. The string had to stretch to it.

My daughter and her bridesmaids loved these for her wedding day preparation attire. The white is a bit see-through, so she wore a camisole underneath. They are so soft and comfortable she wanted a green set for later use.  They fit as expected.
Got two pair of these PJs, each with a different pattern/color. This particular color (red) had a very unpleasant odor – so much so they were returned.
Very comfortable, fine quality, lovely selection of colors, cool when needed, and warm when needed
Got this for postpartum comfort and love the set! Sizing is slightly big
When I tell you these pajamas were so comfort and color was nice ! Quality was nice and warm! Very much breathable! You can twerk dance and much more !!
These pajamas were comfortable and it came on time . Good material and it was worth it
I love this set. It’s soft and cozy.
Es suave y acogedora.

These are lightweight and soft against my skin. I don't overheat in them while sleeping but I still stay warm. The one slightly negative is the drawstring on the shorts is only a small ribbon. Some people may not like this while others don't mind. It's easily removable. I do like this set of pajamas and have already ordered another pair.

The string to the shorts was so thin and had no way of staying outside the hole that now it’s completely inside the shorts and you can’t even tie it because it’s gone very cheaply made not surprised. They need to do better and make quality clothes so now there’s no string to the bottom pants as soon as you wash them, the material fuzzes up immediately
These are great for warmer weather. Very comfy for a good night of sleep
This pijamas Are very soft. Where I leave the weather its very hot and I can wear this and feel fresh by night
These PJ's are really nice! The material is very soft and silky and they are high-quality. True to size. Purchased as a gift. She loves them!

It is good for how reasonable priced it is but definitely could have spent 20 more for a better pair of pajamas. The material is like a fake cotton and doesn’t dry that well. The shorts string is super cheap and the short spandex is uncomfortable. I won’t buy again.
Absolutely love this set, even more than my popular brand bamboo ones. Fabric is very comfortable and not too hot. Keeps me cool on postpartum nights. Easy access for nursing as well.
Cutesy, comfy and light weight

Got two pairs and I’m not impressed. They are kinda cute but I got my regular size instead of sizing up which was a mistake. The shirt is cute and relatively soft and the pants are as well but the pants are so low effort. They don’t even have a lining on the bottom of the shorts to match the shirt (except the gray set for some reason). They put a ribbon for the string on the shorts which I know won’t hold up. All in all not, worth the $20somthing that I paid but I’m not going to return because it was ok.
My wife is normally a petite but this small was still small. Order up a size.
These are so much softer than I was expecting!! They are very stretchy and comfortable, I do recommend typing the short strings into a double knot so they don’t get lost in the shorts

评论概述: Great Comfort and doesn't Hold Heat!!!
评论详情: I'm a night sweater so I was anxious to try them but to my surprise material keeps you warm but it's breathable. Doesn't cling too much and washes up pretty good. Will definitely buy another PJ set.

评论概述: The short string is a cheap piece of ribbon
评论详情: I like the pajamas but the tie on the shorts is a super cheap piece of ribbon. I took it out.
Super soft and exactly as pictured. They're not tight in the waist like some pajama shorts I've tried.
I ordered these and they're Perfect, they're so soft, they're Great quality and you can wear them all year round. I will be ordering more. They are true to size
Looks like picture but the buttons open way too easily not great noticing your buttons are undone randomly throughout the day
Comfortable, soft, and lightweight .

These are almost identical to the Victoria secret modal pjs. Such soft material and perfect light weight pj set! I got my usual size and they fit perfect. Definitely recommend getting a pair, I will be getting more colors!

评论概述: Just buy it!!! You won’t regret it.
评论详情: This pajama set is amazing! Definitely one of my favorite Amazon purchases. The material is super soft and has quite a bit of stretch to it. Perfect for lounging around in. The shorts do not have pockets which would have been nice. Not a big deal though. I am 5’7-135lbs-32 DDD and the size small fits me perfectly. Can’t wait to order more colors!
Love these! True to size, but size up if you have a larger chest and want them baggier.
My granddaughter loved them. Nice and soft
Comfortable and cool sleeping.
Cute and sexy.
My wife normally can just get a small for everything especially stuff like this and she got it and the shorts alone are long enough to reach her knees
I order a small but the pjs look like a large .
After the first wear one button fell off, after the third time the ribbon came out of the shorts. Very dissatisfied

These pajamas are cheap feeling and not high quality. I have bought pajamas similar in style from Walmart at the same price point and those ones are much better than these. They run pretty small in size as well. Don’t waste your money on these!
Nothing to dislike about this pajama set, yet. Stylish, comfortable, fun.
I washed this once (without wearing it b/c it had a new smell). After washing it's all stretched and disfigured.
My mom loved the fabric and it was an accurate size!
Muy Bonita
Super soft, comfy and cute pjs! They were the perfect gift for my grab bag
The white one is completely see through. The material is really soft though. Also, tighter around thighs but stretchy everywhere else.
I like these pajamas for the look and material. It runs big though.

评论概述: Cute but shorts ribbon doesn’t stay in
评论详情: I used this for after my delivery in the hospital. It worked out great for breast feeding and was comfortable.  Only giving 4 stars because the shorts consist of arm ribbon to tie them which came all the way out within a week. Very impossible to feed it back through the shorts so I just threw it away
True to size, comfy
My cousin has a cousin birthday slumber party and we all purchased these pajamas and the material is amazing they come in all sizes and everyone looked great in them

This pajama set is cozy, soft, and the size is spot on! The top drapes nicely, and the shorts are the perfect length. These are definitely going to stay in my rotation. I’m giving four stars because the string in the shorts came out as soon as I put them on. Otherwise, I recommend!  For reference: I'm a 5'8, plus-sized woman and I ordered XL. It doesn't swim on me, and it's also not fitted. Also, the green is a pretty color!
The string came out right away, and you can’t get it back in. Also it smells. Would not recommend

I love these so much! They are not heavy at all and are very soft and comfortable! I sleep so well in these- you will never get too hot! They are also very cute- I do not mind stepping outside in these to take my dog out because of the quality. They do not shrink and wash nicely! I got a medium as I do not want to sleep in anything too tight and they fit great for me!
Love the color and the variety of colors, soft pijama is comfortable and dries fast. Price is affordable and will buy another for my other daughter.

I am always wearing matching pajama sets. This one is by far my favorite! The material is silky smooth /soft. The waist band is elastic, so the string is just for decor, which my daughter has pulled out already. I wish I got these in more colors!

Just had a baby and this was a must have for comfort and ease of breastfeeding. I am 3 months postpartum and still obsessed with this set. The quality is nice and fabric is so soft. I got  2 sets and will be buying another.

评论概述: Falling apart after less than 5 months.
评论详情: These are a terrible cheap quality, thin material, shorts are shapeless and unflattering, ribbon fell out immediately, and in less than 5 months of OCCASIONAL use they are being shredded in the washer and leaving torn fibers all over everything else.
Such a cozy pj! Bought while pregnant!
Perfect for a gift for my sister. Fit true to size and super soft. I have these in other colors for myself
These are very cute and comfortable.  They do tend to pill

评论概述: Comfy and flattering for post partum mama
评论详情: I think I’m gonna have to buy a couple more pairs of these because they are so comfortable at night and for lounging, especially with the easy access for nursing my baby. Comfort is KING when you’re a sleep deprived parent. My (tall- 5’9) 13 year old daughter also has a pair in size large and she loves them! Soft, durable, great value!! 5’6, 180 lbs, size Large, 40” hips, 28” waist, 36D
Bought for granddaughter,  she said fit was good and liked  them
I love sleeping in these cute pjs. They are soft and I look presentable. Some button down pjs can be itchy on the chest around the buttons, not these.
Bought these for a bridal party and they were perfect. They are super soft and looked great! The sizing is perfect fit great and accurate.
Got these for my bridal party and they are perfect! So so soft!!!

评论概述: So soft, still holds up after 6 weeks of washes
评论详情: Bought for my wedding day, they are so soft! Shorts aren’t drawstring though. I have washed and put these in the dryer at least 6 times and they are still in great shape

This is actually super comfortable and very cute ☺️ It's really soft and I like the way the top fits too because it's flattering but it's also not too snug it gives you enough room to where you feel you can move around in it easily.  Only thing that would make it better would be if it had pockets on the shorts but I don't know if that'll happen

I came back a year later to write a review on these pajamas. But in all seriousness these pajamas are soft, thick and well made. I will absolutely be buying more, great find on Amazon. Would definitely recommend. I’m typically a size large and the large are loose, you could probably size down.
Super cute and comfy! These were great when my daughter had shoulder surgery they were cute enough to wear with Jeans and comfy enough to wear all day and night!

I am so happy I went with this specific set, the material was stick, comfortable and soft. It was easy to get the wrinkles out. They also stayed once they were thrown in the dryer. I went with a medium and it was perfect. Not too small not too big. Kept me warm and comfortable throughout the morning. I now sleep in it and it is the best. I would recommend for a bridal party or just to find comfortable nice pajamas. I weigh around 150 pounds and I am 5’5 in height

评论概述: Sizing is not right, and ribbon??? Really???
评论详情: I really like the material of this set. However, the shirt fit fine. The pants were way too tight and not only wear the pants too tight the string to tie the pants is ribbon.. Are we serious that that’s the best we can do?? No one wants to use ribbon to tie their pants together .
Cute n comfy for a reasonable price.
I wear these all the time! They are so soft and so comfortable!
Bought this by mistake but it’s actually so cute and cozy! Not too thick but a nice soft jersey feeling material. It’s a little TINY bit oversized but I think perfect for lounging.
These are the best pajamas I’ve ever had! They are super cute and so comfortable! They are soft and amazing to sleep in. I’m going to buy more in other colors!

评论概述: Good with sizing but suck otherwise
评论详情: I bought a less expensive brand that was way better than these. The drawstring is a super cheap satin ribbon with unfinished edges that unravel immediately  and is too flimsy to be a drawstring. There is interfacing paper on the insude placket which is not sewn down and is awful. No pockets. The fabric however is nice and the fit was loose in the 3x even though im a 260# 5'2" chonk. Buy the other ones if you can ZMJ brand. The fit is tighter ( which I kinda like better)
This set is so cute and comfy!
Literally buy right now it’s so worth it they are so comfy
A little bit for my taste but otherwise perfect
Soft, cute, fit well. Material was nice
I bought these for my bridal party. They fit true to size. I had sizes from medium to 3x and everyone's fit perfectly. Very soft!!
In love with this pajama set! It’s super soft and cozy, I wear it all the time now
Love style comfort quality fit everything about it. I will buy again in other colors
These run small. Also, the shirt is really long. It’s just awkward looking when it’s on. It is very soft and I really liked the color but it was too small and I wasn’t crazy about the way it fits.

i’m obsessed with these pajamas they are soooo good. i need more!!!! they are so stretchy and comfy. i wore them in the hospital after i gave birth and since then they have been my favorite pair of pajamas. the only one thing i don’t like is the string of the shorts is like a ribbon so i feel like that could be improved but they are light weight and stretchy and so comfy
Soft, not synthetic feel and a good value

This item was soft and fit true to size. They had a cheaply made appearance in my opinion. Was looking for button up options for nursing postpartum, and went with a pair from Target instead. Returned!
These pajamas are so comfy I like them a lot. I would definitely buy another pair in a different color. Size fits well, true to size. I would highly recommend.
Very comfortable and great for after I gave birth

Great comfortable fit. Size down if you want more of a tight fit… GREAT material.. will be ordering for future again
Absolutely love these pajamas. They are so soft and comfortable, the sizing is spot on, I ordered a large
This is my go to pj set!! I absolutely love how soft and comfortable it feels. Wish Amazon offered more colors. I would buy all of them.
Very comfortable,  did not get to warm wearing them.

Very comfy pjs. True to size
Very soft and comfy, worth the buy.
These are so soft & have a great fit with longer shirt & shorts. Great for maternity/postpartum
I didnt like the shorts not being loose, they stick to my skin and its very unflattering. the top however is way too long and unflattering as well
Product fits and feels fine but i think my picture says it all. Either i return and get pjs elsewhere or waste my time finding the end of the string. Sick joke.
Super cute and comfortable

Nice fabric & feel. Love the long torso. This top is perfect for pregnancy, postpartum, nursing, and even just tall people with a long torso. I've tried several PJ sets like this in the past, and they are always too short. Loved wearing this in recovery after giving birth.
Very soft and comfortable, fits perfectly.

I bought this in blue and emerald! Its very soft and comfortable. Perfect for summer. I ended up taking the strings out of the pants though since the shorts stay on well without them and the strings kept getting untied. No complaints though
